com.urjanet.Query
Class MasterDetailQuery

java.lang.Object
  com.urjanet.Query.MasterDetailQuery

public class MasterDetailQuery
extends java.lang.Object

Class to perform master detail query Do pre and post tasks 1. go through the master table via range slice query 2. get multiple rows 3. iterate over its columns 4. get the column and construct a string which forms the child row key 5. run child table query 6. get column slices and iterate over them 7. print what's needed

Author:
ac2211
